00033 #ifndef CSV_H
00034 #define CSV_H
00035 
00036 /* csv - read write comma separated value format
00037  */
00038 
00039 #ifdef __cplusplus
00040 extern "C" {
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 # define LIBMBA_API extern
00044 
00045 #include <stdio.h>
00046 /*#include "text.h"*/
00047 
00048 #if defined(USE_WCHAR)
00049 #define csv_row_parse csv_row_parse_wcs
00050 #else
00051 #define csv_row_parse csv_row_parse_str
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #define CSV_TRIM   0x01
00055 #define CSV_QUOTES 0x02
00056 
00057 LIBMBA_API int csv_row_parse_str(const char *src, size_t sn, char *buf, size_t bn, char *row[], int rn, int sep, int flags);
00058 LIBMBA_API int csv_row_parse_wcs(const wchar_t *src, size_t sn, wchar_t *buf, size_t bn, wchar_t *row[], int rn, int sep, int flags);
00059 LIBMBA_API int csv_row_fread(FILE *in, char *buf, size_t bn, char *row[], int numcols, int sep, int flags);
00060 
00061 #ifdef __cplusplus
00062 }
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 #endif /* CSV_H */
